name: Totally Accurate Guide to Love Yourself
name_original: Totally Accurate Guide to Love Yourself
description:
Interactive guide to see yourself as a more handsome person. With the help of our instructor John Handsome you will find the path to love yourself. This is the only way a person can found to love themselves, so send this to all your friends that need to love themselves more and have fun.

Wiki How Article & "Real" Guide to love yourself: https://www.wikihow.com/Love-Your-Body
